/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_Automatic_RawViews_WithManagedIdentity]    Script Date: 12/19/2022 9:18:04 PM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO





CREATE  or Alter   PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_Automatic_RawViews_WithManagedIdentity]
(
    @Table_Name varchar(200),
	@ADLS_Folder Varchar(200),
	@Schema_Name varchar(50)='dbo'
	--execute [dbo].[SP_Automatic_RawViews] 'account','DataverseTest'
)
AS
BEGIN
  SET NOCOUNT ON
  
Begin

	Declare @SQLQuery NVARCHAR(MAX)=''
	declare @tbl_name varchar(200)

	
	SET @SQLQuery =	'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW  ' + @Schema_Name+'.'+@Table_Name +' as
   SELECT 
  *
   FROM

       OPENROWSET (
	        BULK '+ '''/'+@ADLS_Folder+'/dbo_'+@Table_Name+'/'',
		  DATA_SOURCE = ''dls-staging-ManagedIdentity'',
		  FORMAT = ''DELTA''
		  ) AS [result]'
EXEC  (@SQLQuery)
END
END
GO
